text: Aaron Blabey is an Australian author of children's books. He was born on January 1st, 1974. He is the author of three best-selling book series; Pig the Pug – a picture book series about a rude, selfish, mean-spirited little dog, The Bad Guys – a New York Times #1 bestselling graphic novel series for junior readers about a gang of scary-looking animals trying to change their bad reputations, and Thelma the Unicorn – a second picture book series about a plain little pony who pretends to be a unicorn. Until 2005, Blabey was an actor. == Other websites == * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Australian artists Category:Australian children's writers
title: Aaron Blabey
